amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part D of House Report 118-705 to direct the United States Forest Service to expand the use of proactive, targeted animal grazing in fuels management programs to reduce wildfire risk.

vote.text: On agreeing to the LaMalfa amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the LaMalfa amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
